definition: to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study

sentences.english: Recently our classmates are arguing about if the students in Grade 3 in Senior High School should have self-studying classes at night.
sentences.chinese: 我班同学最近就高三学生是否应该上晚自习争论不休。

sentences.english: So after the school starts, there are studies at the evening.
sentences.chinese: 所以开学之后晚上还有晚自习。

sentences.english: Self-study libraries are allowed to stay open past 10 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 国家允许自习图书馆一直开放到午夜十点钟之后。

sentences.english: You can ask all the sec 1 students, now all their classes have been changed to self-revision.
sentences.chinese: 你可以打听一下初一年级的学生，他们的课都自习了。

sentences.english: On the Wednesday I gave my last evening class to Grade 1 students.
sentences.chinese: 星期三我跟1年级的学生上了最后一次晚自习。

sentences.english: He still eats in the canteens and studies in the classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然在学校的餐厅吃饭，在学校的教室自习。

sentences.english: After supper, Ming meets Lin on the way to a classroom for night study .
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后，明在去教室晚自习的路上遇见了林。

sentences.english: A few days ago about a few friends together to the university on Zixi.
sentences.chinese: 前几天约了几个好友一起去大学里上自习。

sentences.english: The school gives the early morning and night coaching arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 学校安排有早读和晚自习辅导。

sentences.english: At night, I still have to 9 p. m. after school.
sentences.chinese: 我还会上晚自习，一直到晚上9点左右放学。

sentences.english: In university, you should spend much time in library and study hall room.
sentences.chinese: 大学期间一定要多去图书馆多去自习室。

sentences.english: Missing the studying room on the overnight.
Self-study courses to study for the cover Kanda Shan.
sentences.chinese: 自习课，以读书为掩饰侃大山。

sentences.english: Today, I spent the day studying with one of my classmates whom I've just met.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我一整天都在跟我刚认识的一位同学上自习。

sentences.english: Secondly, self-study room is not enough.
It's not too early to scope out a quiet place where you'll do your (dare we say it) studying.
sentences.chinese: 现在开始找一个安静的地方自习并不会为时过早。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
(coll.) to sit in on a class
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
